effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
